item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}': Server ID
item.description: This variable specifies the server ID. In MySQL 5.7, server_id must be specified if binary logging is enabled, otherwise the server is not allowed to start.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}': Startup time
item.description: The time at which MySQL was started.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}': UUID
item.description: Universal Unique Identifier (UUID).

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}': Version full
item.description: Full MySQL version information (number and vendor).

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}': Ping
item.description: Test connection with an instance of MySQL.

trigger.name: Instance access failed
trigger.description: Тестовое подключение к экземпляру БД MySQL не успешно. Необходимо проверить работу экземпляра БД, далее проверить работу и настройки zabbix-agent.

dependency.name: Test connection data not received for more than {$DBS_MYSQL_PING_NODATA_WARN} (minutes)

trigger.name: Test connection data not received for more than {$DBS_MYSQL_PING_NODATA_CRIT} (minutes)
trigger.description: Данные о доступности экземпляра БД MySQL не поступали более 12 минут. Необходимо проверить работу экземпляра БД, далее проверить работу и настройки zabbix-agent.

trigger.name: Test connection data not received for more than {$DBS_MYSQL_PING_NODATA_WARN} (minutes)
trigger.description: Данные о доступности экземпляра БД MySQL не поступали более 12 минут. Необходимо проверить работу экземпляра БД, далее проверить работу и настройки zabbix-agent.

dependency.name: Test connection data not received for more than {$DBS_MYSQL_PING_NODATA_CRIT} (minutes)

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' status: Aborted clients per second
item.description: The number of connections that were aborted because the client died without closing the connection properly.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' status: Aborted connections per second
item.description: The number of failed attempts to connect to the MySQL server.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}': Buffer pool dirty
item.description: Ratio of total to dirty pages in the buffer pool.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}': Buffer pool efficiency
item.description: The item shows how effectively the buffer pool is serving reads.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}': Buffer pool utilization
item.description: Ratio of used to total pages in the buffer pool.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' status: Bytes received
item.description: The number of bytes received from all clients.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' status: Bytes sent
item.description: The number of bytes sent to all clients.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' status: Command Delete per second
item.description: The Com_delete counter variable indicates the number of times the delete statement has been executed.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' status: Command Insert per second
item.description: The Com_insert counter variable indicates the number of times the insert statement has been executed.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' status: Command Select
item.description: The Com_select counter variable indicates the number of times the select statement has been executed.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' status: Command Select per second
item.description: The Com_select counter variable indicates the number of times the select statement has been executed.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' status: Command Update per second
item.description: The Com_update counter variable indicates the number of times the update statement has been executed.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' status: Connections per second
item.description: The number of connection attempts (successful or not) to the MySQL server.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' status: Connection errors accept per second
item.description: Number of errors that occurred during calls to accept() on the listening port.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' status: Connection errors internal per second
item.description: Number of refused connections due to internal server errors, for example out of memory errors, or failed thread starts.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' status: Connection errors max connections per second
item.description: Number of refused connections due to the max_connections limit being reached.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' status: Connection errors peer address per second
item.description: Number of errors while searching for the connecting client IP address.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' status: Connection errors select per second
item.description: Number of errors during calls to select() or poll() on the listening port. The client would not necessarily have been rejected in these cases.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' status: Connection errors tcpwrap per second
item.description: Number of connections the libwrap library refused.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' status: Created tmp tables on disk
item.description: The number of internal on-disk temporary tables created by the server while executing statements.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' status: Created tmp files on disk
item.description: How many temporary files mysqld has created.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' status: Created tmp tables on memory
item.description: The number of internal temporary tables created by the server while executing statements.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' status: InnoDB buffer pool dirty pages
item.description: The current number of dirty pages in the InnoDB buffer pool.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' status: InnoDB buffer pool pages free
item.description: The number of free pages in the InnoDB buffer pool.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' status: InnoDB buffer pool pages total
item.description: The total size of the InnoDB buffer pool, in pages.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' status: InnoDB buffer pool reads
item.description: The number of logical reads that InnoDB could not satisfy from the buffer pool, and had to read directly from disk.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' status: InnoDB buffer pool read requests
item.description: The number of logical read requests.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' status: InnoDB row lock time
item.description: The total time spent in acquiring row locks for InnoDB tables, in milliseconds.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' status: InnoDB row lock time max
item.description: The maximum time to acquire a row lock for InnoDB tables, in milliseconds.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' status: InnoDB row lock waits
item.description: The number of times operations on InnoDB tables had to wait for a row lock.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' status: Max used connections
item.description: The maximum number of connections that have been in use simultaneously since the server started.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' status: Open files
item.description: The number of files that are open. This count includes regular files opened by the server. It does not include other types of files such as sockets or pipes. Also, the count does not include files that storage engines open using their own internal functions rather than asking the server level to do so.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' status: Open tables
item.description: The number of tables that are open.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}': Query cache efficiency
item.description: Query cache efficiency in percentage.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}': Query cache efficiency (2)
item.description: Query cache efficiency in percentage.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' status: Query cache free memory
item.description: The amount of free memory for the query cache.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' status: Query cache hits
item.description: The number of query cache hits.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' status: Query cache inserts
item.description: The number of queries added to the query cache.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' status: Query cache lowmem prunes
item.description: The number of queries that were deleted from the query cache because of low memory.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' status: Query cache not cached
item.description: The number of noncached queries (not cacheable, or not cached due to the query_cache_type setting).

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' status: Queries per second
item.description: The number of statements executed by the server. This variable includes statements executed within stored programs, unlike the Questions variable.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' status: Questions per second
item.description: The number of statements executed by the server. This includes only statements sent to the server by clients and not statements executed within stored programs, unlike the Queries variable.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' status: Slow queries per second
item.description: The number of queries that have taken more than long_query_time seconds. This counter increments regardless of whether the slow query log is enabled.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' status: Threads cached
item.description: The number of threads in the thread cache.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' status: Threads connected
item.description: The number of currently open connections.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' status: Threads created
item.description: The number of threads created to handle connections. If Threads_created is big, you may want to increase the thread_cache_size value. The cache miss rate can be calculated as Threads_created/Connections.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' status: Threads running
item.description: The number of threads that are not sleeping.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' status: Uptime
item.description: The number of seconds that the server has been up.

trigger.name: Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' has just been restarted
trigger.description: Процесс mysqld был перезапущен. Необходимо проверить факт перезапуска на сервере, проверить логи, далее уточнить в чате кто произвел перезапуск. Возможно, что перезапуск произошел в результате краха процесса в автоматическом режиме.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' variable: Have query cache
item.description: YES if mysqld supports the query cache, NO if not.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' variable: Hostname
item.description: Hostname

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' variable: Max connections
item.description: The maximum permitted number of simultaneous client connections.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' variable: Query cache limit
item.description: Do not cache results that are larger than this number of bytes. The default value is 1MB.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' variable: Query cache min res until
item.description: The minimum size (in bytes) for blocks allocated by the query cache. The default value is 4096 (4KB).

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' variable: Query cache size
item.description: The amount of memory allocated for caching query results. By default, the query cache is disabled.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' variable: Query cache type
item.description: Set the query cache type. 0 or OFF - Do not cache results in or retrieve results from the query cache. Note that this does not deallocate the query cache buffer. To do that, you should set query_cache_size to 0. 1 or ON - Cache all cacheable query results except for those that begin with SELECT SQL_NO_CACHE. 2 or DEMAND - Cache results only for cacheable queries that begin with SELECT SQL_CACHE.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}' variable: Table open cache
item.description: The number of open tables for all threads. Increasing this value increases the number of file descriptors that mysqld requires.

item.name: [MySQL] Instance '{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE}': Version
item.description: Version of MySQL instance.

trigger.name: Version of MySQL has been changed
trigger.description: Версия экземпляра MySQL была изменена. Необходимо проверить факт изменения версии, выяснить причину изменения версии (плановый апгрейд и т.п.), передать данные эксперту.

trigger.name: Query cache efficiency is very low
trigger.description: Процент эффективности кэша запросов, составляет менее 20%, указывает на проблему с производительностью. Постарайтесь сократить набор результатов, создав более строгие запросы. Если это невозможно, Вы можете увеличить параметр query_cache_limit, чтобы большее количество ваших наборов результатов действительно попадало в кеш. Увеличивайте query_cache_limit постепенно, сильно высокие значения могут снизить производительность.

trigger.expression: {DBS_Template MySQL for Windows:mysql.status[{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE},threads_connected].min(3m)}/{DBS_Template MySQL for Windows:mysql.variable[{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE},max_connections].last()}*100>{$DBS_MYSQL_CONNECTION_PRC_CRIT} and {DBS_Template MySQL for Windows:mysql.variable[{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE},max_connections].last()}>0
trigger.name: Too many connections

trigger.expression: {DBS_Template MySQL for Windows:mysql.status[{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE},threads_connected].min(3m)}/{DBS_Template MySQL for Windows:mysql.variable[{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE},max_connections].last()}*100>{$DBS_MYSQL_CONNECTION_PRC_WARN} and {DBS_Template MySQL for Windows:mysql.variable[{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE},max_connections].last()}>0
trigger.name: Too many connections

dependency.name: Too many connections
dependency.expression: {DBS_Template MySQL for Windows:mysql.status[{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE},threads_connected].min(3m)}/{DBS_Template MySQL for Windows:mysql.variable[{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE},max_connections].last()}*100>{$DBS_MYSQL_CONNECTION_PRC_CRIT} and {DBS_Template MySQL for Windows:mysql.variable[{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE},max_connections].last()}>0

trigger.expression: {DBS_Template MySQL for Windows:mysql.status[{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE},threads_running].min(3m)}/{DBS_Template MySQL for Windows:mysql.variable[{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE},max_connections].last()}*100>{$DBS_MYSQL_THREADS_RUNNING_PRC_CRIT} and {DBS_Template MySQL for Windows:mysql.variable[{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE},max_connections].last()}>0 and {DBS_Template MySQL for Windows:mysql.status[{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE},threads_connected].last()}>0
trigger.name: Too many threads running

trigger.expression: {DBS_Template MySQL for Windows:mysql.status[{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE},threads_running].min(3m)}/{DBS_Template MySQL for Windows:mysql.variable[{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE},max_connections].last()}*100>{$DBS_MYSQL_THREADS_RUNNING_PRC_WARN} and {DBS_Template MySQL for Windows:mysql.variable[{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE},max_connections].last()}>0 and {DBS_Template MySQL for Windows:mysql.status[{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE},threads_connected].last()}>0
trigger.name: Too many threads running

dependency.name: Too many threads running
dependency.expression: {DBS_Template MySQL for Windows:mysql.status[{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE},threads_running].min(3m)}/{DBS_Template MySQL for Windows:mysql.variable[{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE},max_connections].last()}*100>{$DBS_MYSQL_THREADS_RUNNING_PRC_CRIT} and {DBS_Template MySQL for Windows:mysql.variable[{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE},max_connections].last()}>0 and {DBS_Template MySQL for Windows:mysql.status[{$DBS_MYSQL_INSTANCE},threads_connected].last()}>0
